name: Lunatic Rave 2
description:
Lunatic Rave 2 (abbreviated to LR2) is a BMS Simluator game made by Lavalse, cyclia, SHiNKA, Kamiyu and mur.

The gameplay is similar to the Beatmania and Beatmania IIDX series made by the Bemani division of Konami. Lunatic Rave 2 is one of the most used BMS Simulators in Japan.

There are no stages made by the LR2 staff themselves. Most stages are created by players and composers around the world. Most stages are made during special events where composers send in their songs or stages. The most popular event being BMS Of Fighters, which is an annual competition where hundreds of artists and composers send in their submissions and compete to make the best song and stage.

Lunatic Rave 2 also has an internet ranking, where you can see the ranking list of all the songs available, as well as find download links for them.
